name: Langton's Ant (itch) (Arcus)
description:
Langton's ant is a two-dimensional universal Turing machine with a very simple set of rules but complex emergent behaviour. The expansion to multiple colours allows for the addition of more rules.

This coding project was made entirely by Archie J. Piatt.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Langton%27s_ant
